fields.description: Whether or not a mushroom is poisonous

card.description: This dataset contains descriptions of hypothetical examples of 23 species of gilled mushrooms in Agaricus and Lepiota families, drawn from The Audubon Society Field Guide to North American Mushrooms. The goal is to determine, from various attributes, whether or not a mushroom is poisonous.

context.potentialUses: Determine whether a given mushroom is poisonous.
context.potentialMisuses: Since it's only for two families of mushrooms, it might not be accurate on all types: don't eat a mushroom you find in the wild just because the model thinks it's edible!
